name: To The Stars (Noah Souser)
description:
This is a game where you play as a comet flying through space. Your objective is to survive for as long as possible without getting hit by any asteroids in this short gameplay experience. 

How To Play:

Use WASD to move

Press the Spacebar to use your shield, which has a limited resource

Asteroid colors and meanings: Red = danger, Blue = refill shield energy, Yellow = slow time

Credits: 

Created By Noah Souser
